# LeadPop - Exclusive Business Loan Leads

## About
LeadPop provides exclusive, pre-qualified business loan leads to lenders. We cover all ad spend upfront - lenders only pay for qualified leads that meet their criteria.

## Business Model
- Pay-per-qualified-lead pricing
- Zero upfront costs for lenders
- 100% exclusive leads (never sold to multiple buyers)
- OTP-verified contacts
- Free lead replacement guarantee

## Services
- SBA Loans (7a, 504)
- Merchant Cash Advances (MCA)
- Equipment Financing
- Lines of Credit
- Invoice Factoring
- Term Loans
- Working Capital
- Commercial Real Estate Financing
- Revenue-Based Financing
- Startup & Microloans

## Lead Filtering
Custom filters available:
- Credit score thresholds (550+, 600+, 650+, etc.)
- Annual revenue requirements ($100K to $10M+)
- Time in business minimums
- Loan amount ranges
- Geographic targeting (state, region, nationwide)
- Industry & business type preferences
- Monthly bank deposits (for MCA products)

## Technology Stack
- Static HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- Hosted on Vercel
- Global CDN for fast delivery
- AI-powered campaign optimization
